name: Body Swap
description:
An out of control game where you play as the enemies attempting moving into your own way

Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 (Theme: Out of Control)

Controls: 

W,A,S,D: Move

X: Change Controlled Character

Left Muse: Throw Boomerang

Credits

Music: Abstraction

Assets: S4M_UR4I
